courses.name: Studio Instruction for Majors
courses.description: Acceptable as a secondary applied subject on B.S. in music education and B.M. degrees. Materials varies according to educational purpose. May be repeated for credit.

courses.name: Studio Instruction
courses.description: Credit accepted toward all undergraduate music and music education degrees. May be repeated for credit.

courses.name: Studio Instruction
courses.description: Accepted as upperclass credit only in Music Education, music theory, history, or composition.  May be repeated for credit.
courses.prerequisites: 8 hours and 4 semesters of MUS_APMS 2455 or equivalent; audition by committee, and instructor's consent

courses.name: Junior Recital
courses.description: Preparation and presentation of Junior Recital. Appropriate applied music course to be taken concurrently. May be repeated for credit. Each recital must be approved by a committee at least two weeks before the recital.

courses.name: Studio Instruction
courses.description: For B.M. degrees in performance.  Study of pedagogy in studio class.  May be repeated for credit.
courses.prerequisites: 8 hours and 4 semesters of MUS_APMS 2455; audition; instructor's consent

courses.name: Senior Recital
courses.description: Preparation and presentation of Senior Recital. Appropriate applied music course to be taken concurrently. May be repeated for credit. Each recital must be approved by a committee at least two weeks before the recital.

courses.name: Studio Instruction
courses.description: For music teachers needing instruction in secondary instruments or voice. Maybe repeated for credit.

courses.name: Studio Instruction
courses.description: For graduate credit on M.A., M.Ed., and Ph.D. degrees. Study of pedagogy in studio class. May be repeated for credit.

courses.name: Studio Instruction
courses.description: Required for graduate credit as major applied study on M.M. degree. Acceptable for graduate credit on M.A., M.Ed., Ed.D., and Ph.D. degrees. Maybe repeated for credit.
courses.prerequisites: audition by committee and instructor's consent

courses.name: Graduate Recital
courses.description: Preparation and presentation of Graduate Recital. Appropriate applied music course to be taken concurrently. May be repeated for credit. Each recital must be approved by a committee at least two weeks before the recital.
